author: Jeff

review: I only use the Fire TV Stick for Netflix and Amazon streaming, and they both work very well with a 10Mbps internet connection. The interface is nice as well as the remote. I considered just getting a Smart TV instead, but it ended up being a far better value to just purchase the stick. No need to pay a premium for a Smart TV, and I can unplug the stick and take it with me when travelling! It would be nice if the stick could power itself through the HDMI port, but with some TV's you can power it via a spare USB port on the TV. Otherwise, you need to have an extra outlet available as it is with most other streaming type sticks.
